overview: Lore Perseous's family was murdered as a part of the Agon, a divine hunt that occurs every seven years as punishment for a past rebellion by nine Greek gods, who are forced to walk the earth as mortals and be hunted. After years in hiding, Lore has to decide if she reenters the Agon to avenge her familyâ€™s death with the help of a childhood friend she thought was dead and Athena, one of the last of the original gods.
title: Lore
